import React, { useState } from "react"; import { alpha, makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper'; import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; import Accordion from '@material-ui/core/Accordion'; import AccordionSummary from '@material-ui/core/AccordionSummary'; import AccordionDetails from '@material-ui/core/AccordionDetails'; import ExpandMoreIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ExpandMore'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import InputBase from '@material-ui/core/InputBase'; import TextareaAutosize from '@material-ui/core/TextareaAutosize'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ container: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(12, 1fr)', gridGap: theme.spacing(3), }, paper: { padding: theme.spacing(1), textAlign: 'center', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, whiteSpace: 'nowrap', marginBottom: theme.spacing(1), }, divider: { margin: theme.spacing(2, 0), }, search: { position: 'relative', borderRadius: theme.shape.borderRadius, backgroundColor: alpha(theme.palette.common.white, 0.15), '&:hover': { backgroundColor: alpha(theme.palette.common.white, 0.25), }, marginLeft: 0, width: '100%', [theme.breakpoints.up('sm')]: { marginLeft: theme.spacing(1), width: 'auto', }, }, searchIcon: { padding: theme.spacing(0, 2), height: '100%', position: 'absolute', pointerEvents: 'none', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, inputRoot: { color: 'inherit', }, inputInput: { padding: theme.spacing(1, 1, 1, 0), // vertical padding + font size from searchIcon paddingLeft: `calc(1em + ${theme.spacing(4)}px)`, transition: theme.transitions.create('width'), width: '100%', [theme.breakpoints.up('sm')]: { width: '12ch', '&:focus': { width: '20ch', }, }, }, })); export default function FAQsOne() { const classes = useStyles(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [flag, setFlag] = useState(false); function handleHome() { navigate('/') } function handleMore() { setFlag(true); } function handleLess() { setFlag(false); } return (

Hey! how can i help you

 {/* xs=3 */}
FAQ
} aria-controls="panel1a-content" id="panel1a-header" > Where Can I download I OTT? It's available on Android Google Play Store and Apple app Store with no charges. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Where can I register to I OTT? You can register to I OTT in register screen with required details. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Where can I login to I OTT? You can Login to I OTT in Login screen with required registered details. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Does I OTT have content on regional languages? IOTT offers best content on available regional languages and with subtitles in some languages. {!flag ? more : ""} {flag ?
} aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Can I download Content videos on I OTT? No, you cannot download the content videos to watch offline. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > How can I recharge my I OTT Wallet? Tap on the Wallet option, Add funds and by using Credit card, Debit card, Internet banking and UPI are accepted. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > How many days validity for a movie unlocked in IOTT? If the movie is once unlocked, it's absolutely free for your entire lifetime. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Can I install my IOTT account on new device? You can, but only one login for one account. You can your I OTT on your new phone with your settings, Watch list and movie unlocks unchanged. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > I made my transaction, but my wallet isn't recharged? We are sorry for that; it might be technical issues not reflecting on I OTT. If any technical failure the amount will be credited to source within 7 business days } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Can I withdraw money from my I OTT account? No, once your wallet is topped up. It is non-refundable and you can use it unlock as many movies as you can. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Issue during Register or Login on I OTT? We are very sorry at the first place. Once check your internet connection and Enter Correct username and password. Remember only one login for one account. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > How can I change my registered mobile number? You cannot update the mobile number. If you want to login with your new mobile number you have to register with new mobile number. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Error while playing video? Stabilize your Internet connection and Try again. If you still haven't satisfied. Contact our Helpline service. We will resolve as soon as possible. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Any Hidden charges on I OTT? No Hidden charges at any Point. } aria-controls="panel2a-content" id="panel2a-header" > Can I set Personalize settings in I OTT? You can personalize your watch list, your name in profile screen, Parental Controls and can track your history. less
